alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Douglas; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 1:39PM CDT until May 12 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pine County in east central Minnesota... Southwestern Douglas County in northwestern Wisconsin... Washburn County in northwestern Wisconsin... Burnett County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 138 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grantsburg, or 17 miles east of Pine City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Siren around 150 PM CDT. Webster around 155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Danbury, Webb Lake Wisconsin, Wascott and Minong. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
